title: From Skills to Shifts: How Climate Investigations Get Results
content: Jan 29, 2026 3pm-4:30pm (UK Time) Over the last four years, we’ve learned a lot about how journalism can get results in pushing for climate progress and addressing injustice. Through the Open Climate Reporting Initiative (OCRI) we’ve empowered hundreds of frontline reporters in 58 countries with cutting edge skills for investigative research and create engaging content.
